channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Requiring Login for Forum Posting" - Thoughts?

item.title: Re: Requiring Login for Forum Posting
item.content:encoded: Correction, it's just required for the Village forum now. I want to leave Anonymous open for page discussions and for the general forums to make it easier for people to ask questions.

item.title: Requiring Login for Forum Posting
item.content:encoded: I'm thinking about requiring that you be logged in to post in the forums. A lot of people are staying anonymous and it's making it difficult to track who's saying what at times.
